NewsArticle.Title: Kru News: Robo Smasher Screenshot Event
NewsArticle.Content: To celebrate the release of Robo Smasher, Kru Interactive will be giving away the latest in electronic gadgets to the people who can take the best Robo Smasher screenshots. Show off your talent for taking great screenshots and win great prizes like the iPad or iPod Touch. Click here for details and rules.
